tool_description: Conversation memory for your openai gpt api chatbots and chatgpt agents.
name: short_ai_memory
title: short_ai_memory

api_list.name: chat
api_list.description: a chat endpoint for chatgpt chatbot with memory.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://short_ai_memory.p.rapidapi.com/chat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "short_ai_memory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://short_ai_memory.p.rapidapi.com/chat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
